'''Cûm-nan-Arasaith''', the "Mound of Avarice", is the mound where many Elves and Dwarves were laid to rest in Doriath after the battle in [[Menegroth]].<ref>{{SM|3}}</ref>

==Other versions of the legendarium==
The mound was named '''Cûm an-Idrisaith''' in ''Lost Tales''.<ref name=LT2/>
